title: Riot i think you been drinking a little much

replies.body: Literally what i thought when this came on...
Bringing this up with Riot. Thanks for the report!
That was from last week ya moron, click on the link it is a schedule.
Hint: That may be the case, but why am i being told in client that it's nexus siege?

Hint: The title could have been more clear but then again if I had judged what you were saying by "Riot I think you have been drinking a little too much" then I would consult their bosses and try and get some people fired.

But Riot is not known for making clear logic so the fact that you expect it by now seems odd.
